https://tmrev.io/movie/518975-A Russian Youth 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xv5SiSVuMKXDdG8ozYLD59CBcZx.jpg A teenage soldier in World War I—a simple village boy with a naive youthful dream of fame and medals—throws himself into the unknown and goes blind in the first battle, thus taking on a new job: intercepting enemy planes by listening to the air through huge metal funnels. A Russian Youth
